text: Huso is a genus of critically endangered sturgeons from Eurasia. == Species == There are two species: * Huso huso Linnaeus, 1758 (beluga) * Huso dauricus Georgi, 1775 (kaluga) == References == # Vasil'eva, E.D.; Vasil'ev, V.P.; Shedko, S.V. & Novomodny, G.V. (2009). "The revision of the validity of genus Huso (Acipenseridae) based on recent morphological and genetic data with particular reference to the Kaluga H. dauricus" (PDF). Journal of Ichthyology. == Other websites == * https://doi.org/10.1111%2Fj.1439-0426.2008.01088.x Category:Acipenseriformes Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Huso
